presentation

Class FileChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • presentation.ContentInterface
              • presentation.ContentDecorator
                • presentation.FileChooser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class FileChooser
extends ContentDecorator
    FileChooser is a ContentDecorator that adds the functionality to the user of selecting a file or directory and executing a desired action with the selected file
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int COMPARISON_MODE 
      static int COMPRESSION_MODE
      This mode enables the compression of a directory or a file
      static int DECOMPRESSION_MODE
      This mode enables the decompression of a file, thus requiring the FILES_ONLY flag
      static int DIRECTORIES_ONLY
      This mode limits the selection of the file browsing only to directories
      static int FILES_ONLY
      This mode limits the selection of the file browsing only to files
      private int filesSelected 
      private CustomButton functionButton
      This button executes the specified action
      private int mode
      The compression mode defines the functionality of the function button currently only COMPRESSION_MODE and DECOMPRESSION_MODE and COMPARISON_MODE are supported
      private java.util.ArrayList<FileSelector> selectors 
      private View view
      This is a reference to the main view since we need to tell it when the function button has been activated in order to activate the desired functionality

    • Field Detail

      • functionButton

        private CustomButton functionButton
        This button executes the specified action

      • mode

        private int mode
        The compression mode defines the functionality of the function button currently only COMPRESSION_MODE and DECOMPRESSION_MODE and COMPARISON_MODE are supported

      • view

        private View view
        This is a reference to the main view since we need to tell it when the function button has been activated in order to activate the desired functionality

      • COMPRESSION_MODE

        public static final int COMPRESSION_MODE
        This mode enables the compression of a directory or a file
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DECOMPRESSION_MODE

        public static final int DECOMPRESSION_MODE
        This mode enables the decompression of a file, thus requiring the FILES_ONLY flag
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • COMPARISON_MODE

        public static final int COMPARISON_MODE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILES_ONLY

        public static final int FILES_ONLY
        This mode limits the selection of the file browsing only to files
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DIRECTORIES_ONLY

        public static final int DIRECTORIES_ONLY
        This mode limits the selection of the file browsing only to directories
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileChooser

        public FileChooser(ContentInterface content,
                   java.lang.String[] types,
                   java.lang.String buttonFunction,
                   View parentView,
                   int functionMode,
                   int fileMode)

        Base FileChooser constructor

        Parameters:
        content - reference to the base content, or parent content for the decoration
        types - list of permitted extensions
        buttonFunction - is the name displayed in the function button
        parentView - is the reference to the view
        functionMode - is the selected function mode
        fileMode - is the selected file selection mode
